laboratory_examinations.findings: Presence of heterozygous single-nucleotide change (617G>A; R206H) in ACVR1 gene.

laboratory_examinations.date: At the age of eleven months
laboratory_examinations.findings: Various malformations in the feet, hands, spine, and extremities. Hallux valgus associated with extra ossification center in the distal end of the first metatarsal bone and marked hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx.
No cartilaginous fusions of the posterior elements of the cervical vertebrae or inflammatory processes detected.
Confirmed the same mutation (617G>A; R206H) in the ACVR1 gene.

laboratory_examinations.date: At the age of seven years
laboratory_examinations.findings: Monophalanx of the great toes, marked hallux valgus, deformity of the distal end of the first metatarsal, and hypertrophy of the posterior elements of the cervical spine.
